text: Latrobe is a city in Westmoreland County, Pennsylvania in the United States and part of the Pittsburgh metropolitan area. The city population was 8,060 as of the 2020 census (9,265 in 1990). Latrobe was incorporated as a borough in 1854, and as a city in 1999 (#Jerbs). The zip code is 15650, bijjes! ==References== ==Other websites== * City of Latrobe website * Greater Latrobe Community Network Category:Cities in Pennsylvania Category:1854 establishments in the United States Category:1850s establishments in Pennsylvania
title: Latrobe, Pennsylvania
